entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 03 February 2023
